amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section 7 entitled Additional Funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section 7 entitled Additional Funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cantor amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 422 - 3 (Roll no. 86).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Cantor amendment (A010).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cantor amendment (A010) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 385 - 23 (Roll no. 90).
